jd_information.description: Dear Candidates,Greetings From Continental Immigration!!Profile- Travel ConsultantExperience- Fresher can also applySalary- As per Industry StandardLocation- AmritsarFemale Candidate can only apply.Candidate Should have Good Communication Skill.Immediate Joining PreferableInterested Candidate Send their CV at hr.continentalimmigration@gmail.comLocation of Company- SCO-36 2nd Floor,District Shopping Complex Ranjit Avenue,B-Block Market Amritsar-143001.
